Noah Schwadron info

This Magazine is for Snails

2023
editorial

A journal of art and ecology for people who live slowly and intentionally. The design is inspired by homely web 1.0 gardening blogs (where all the best gardening tips come from), but remains elevated in order to appeal to a design-savvy audience.

1/

Muriel Cooper

2023
exhibition

A proposed exhibition of the pioneering digital designer’s career. My goal was to create an identity and design system that is engaging and memorable but never attempts to outshine Muriel’s design work.

1/

Click Shirt

2022
apparel, silkscreen

I once had a dream that I found a Click promo t-shirt at a thrift store. Upset that it was only a dream, I made that shirt into a beautiful reality.

1/

BioMuseo Generative Identity

2022
identity, code

Biomuseo is a museum in Panama dedicated to exploring the natural history of the country. For numerous reasons, the concept of biodiversity is central to that story. The logo visually reflects the museum’s iconic architecture, and its generative nature reflects their focus on biodiversity.

1/

First Things First

2022
editorial

For AIGA’s manifesto calling for designers to prioritize cultural and functional work over consumeristic projects, I wanted to show their seriousness, but also convey momentum and hope.

1/

Smaller Projects

A collection of work from various from school, freelance, and personal projects.

1/
